entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
